work.name: CANAL+
work.summary: Les problématiques principales de cette mission consistaient à migrer un ensemble d'applications sur le Cloud AWS et assurer un déploiement automatisé et continues de celle-ci.
work.skillsUsed: Terraform, Packer, Bash, Gitlab, Gitlab CI, Ansible, Docker, Pre-commit, Linux, Windows server, SSH, AWS SSM, AWS ELB, AWS EC2, AWS Elastic Beanstalk, AWS ECR, GitOps
highlights: Developing automations to build Cloud machine images using Packer, Ansible and Gitlab CI
Setting up Gitlab's cache dependency proxy for Docker image pulls
Configuration and deployment of dedicated gitlab runner agents with Terraform and Packer
Automating infrastructure deployments with dedicated Terraform modules for applications
Application sharing on separate private networks using VPC endpoints (VPCe)
Study and implementation of a Blue/Green and Canary architecture with Terraform and AWS load balancers
Supporting the teams on the open source methodology with the use of issues, merge requests, code review. Creation of verification CIs and code validation using pre-commit.
Regular writing of documentation to ensure optimal knowledge transfer
Contributed to the CloudPosse community on their Beanstalk module by integrating some changes implemented during the mission. https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elastic-beanstalk-environment
Proposed a new way to manage and prioritize the team's tasks using Gitlab issues

work.name: BNP Paribas Cardif
work.summary: The mission focuses on the administration of the new Domino Datalab Big Data platform in the Orange OCB Cloud.
work.skillsUsed: Scrum, JIRA, Linux (Rhel), Windows, Docker, OCB, Kubernetes, Yaml, Shell, Terraform, Gitlab, Apache, Nginx, Grafana, Prometheus, Domino Datalab, Apache airflow, Python, Hadoop HDP 2.6, XFB gateway, SaltStack
highlights: Implemented ETL mechanics with Docker and Python code to enable group data import within Domino
Improved servers fleet management with Ansible
Created a Docker image to allow connection to the Hadoop datalake.
Production deployment of data science models via Domino and Kubernetes
Implementation of a data governance on Domino Datalab and management of access rights
Performing debugging operations on the Kubernetes cluster of the solution
Exchanges with the Cloud support and the editor of Domino Datalab to resolve problems or requests for features
Documentation of processes, tools and developments
Establishment of an agile methodology with a Kanban board and daily/weekly meetings

work.name: BNP Paribas - BP2I
work.summary: The main objective is to industrialize the process of deployment and the evolution of the Big Data group offer that will be proposed.
work.skillsUsed: Scrum (Kanban + Sprints), JIRA, DevOps, GitOps, Linux (Rhel, Ubuntu), Windows, Yaml, Shell, Gitlab, Jenkins, Nexus, Sonar, Apache, Nginx, Oracle Exadata, Hue, Jupyterlab, Stack HDP 2.6, Nimsoft, Sphinx doc, autosys, Ansible, Python, Cloud intern, SSH, Kerberos
highlights: Rework, clean up and improve stability of Ansible code to deploy Hadoop cluster
Versioning and setting up a release system with, Gitlab, Gitlab CI
Evolution of the documentation for delivery/run by moving from Word to Sphinx doc to allow web display and versioning of it
Drastic overhaul of existing documentation (Rewriting)
Definition of the Ranger security rules and policies by default access on the cluster
Moving to high availability and stabilizing the Kerberos security service
Testing and validation of the stability of the Hadoop architecture (HDFS, Yarn, Hive, Kerberos...)
Development and automation of post installation unit tests
Increasing the number of nodes and revising the service distribution to ensure service stability in production.
Creation and deployment with Ansible of Nimsoft and AutoSys production monitoring and alarm rules
Support for delivery/run teams for the implementation of deployment mechanisms and problem corrections

work.name: Devoteam
work.position: Industrialization of distributed systems for continuous high availability of data - Devoteam (Internship)
work.summary: During this internship, I worked on different aspects of distributed systems as part of a project to industrialize the upgrades of a Hadoop solution
work.skillsUsed: Hadoop, Ansible, Gitlab, Gantt, Linux, Kerberos
highlights: Preparation and planning of the tasks to be done during the internship with a Gantt chart
Deploying a Hadoop cluster without a wizard, the objective being to understand the tool used
Automation of deployment and installation processes with Ansible
Deployment of a distributed HortonWorks solution
Documentation of processes, tools and developments
Implementation of high availability of data and services of the cluster and of a Kerberos security
Realization of rolling upgrades on the cluster
Report on the tool's capabilities to perform rolling updates
